Pre-Game Insights: Reynaldo Lopez will start for the Atlanta Braves against the Philadelphia Phillies, with J.T. Realmuto on the mound for the Phillies.
Bookmakers list the Phillies as -135 moneyline favorites, with the Braves at +115 odds.
Philadelphia (-1.5) on the run line is favored, with an over/under of 7.5 runs.
Others: The Phillies have a 6-4 record with a 4.5 runs per game average, while the Braves have a 7-3 record with a 4.3 runs per game average.
Key players include Alec Bohm, Bryce Harper, and Kyle Schwarber for the Phillies, and Marcell Ozuna for the Braves.
